latex:
If $ \frac {x^2 - bx}{ax - c} = \frac {m - 1}{m + 1}$ has roots which are numerical equal but of opposite signs, the value of $ m$ must be:\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \frac {a - b}{a + b} \qquad\textbf{(B)}\ \frac {a + b}{a - b} \qquad\textbf{(C)}\ c \qquad\textbf{(D)}\ \frac {1}{c} \qquad\textbf{(E)}\ 1$
